mapper.select: select * from member m left join authorities a on m.member_id = a.member_id where m.member_id = #{memberId}
mapper.insert: insert into member values( #{memberId}, #{memberPassword}, #{memberName}, #{birthday}, #{email}, #{phone}, default, #{profileOriginal}, #{profileRenamed}, #{memberAddr}, #{locCode}, default, default )
mapper.update: update member set profile_original = #{profileOriginal}, profile_renamed = #{profileRenamed}, member_name = #{memberName}, birthday = #{birthday}, email = #{email}, phone = #{phone}, member_addr = #{memberAddr} where member_id = #{memberId}
